name: ROBLOX: B&W THEME - read description!!!!!
description:
please set your theme to dark before putting this theme on. also, if you dont do the next steps, other websites you visit will be affected my my css. First, click the extension icon on the top of the site AFTER you get the style. Click the three dots, and go to MANAGE ALL STYLES. Click edit on my style, and at the bottom click specify, and then URLS ON THE DOMAIN, then type in roblox.com. Click save, and then your done!! if you dont do this every other page you visit will look weird. 

 :D  made this because i could not find a good theme on here so enjoy! If you liked my theme follow me on roblox: ppeashy c:
additional_info: also ads dont show with this theme!!! :D
